Text: Thank you Snowhiter! We have been waiting for the finale one! This has been a great series and great quality upload - thank you.
Glad you have all appreciated this series - will continue to upload Hatufim and Varg Veum. Spiral 4 will be next - when its aired... Thanx for all comments ;)
I'm a Snowhiter 'groupie'. He/she is consistently delivering top quality stuff and it's my pleasure to re-seed.
Thank You For The Many Hours of Great Viewing. You Deserve Some Sort Of Award.
